integ and sign constant in algol a few remark argiven on the relat between syntax and semant in theprogram languag the aim is to point out that ifit is true that the grammar of a context freelanguag should be conceiv not onli as a string generdevic but also as a method for express a meanthen the grammar of algol is open to some criticcacm decemb 1964 petron l vandoni c e ca641222 jbmarch 9 1978 2 35 pm 1086 4 949 11024 949 1132 4 949 1142 4 949 1234 4949 1263 4 949 1265 4 949 1270 4 9491323 4 949 1358 4 949 1379 4 949 13804 949 1453 4 949 1464 4 949 1484 4949 1491 4 949 1498 4 949 1613 4 9491614 4 949 1781 4 949 1781 4 949 17814 949 1825 4 949 1860 4 949 1945 4949 1945 4 949 2083 4 949 2178 4 9492179 4 949 2252 4 949 2325 4 949 23414 949 2546 4 949 2645 4 949 2652 4949 2684 4 949 2842 4 949 2929 4 9492934 4 949 3069 4 949 669 4 949 6794 949 691 4 949 761 4 949 762 4949 949 4 949 949 4 949 949 4 949989 4 949 949 5 949 949 5 949 9495 949 483 5 949 584 5 949 3184 5949
